Imprint.Imprint:Pattern:
SELECT [@ picks @]
, (case
when [@ aspect.field @] [@ aspect.operator @] [@ aspect.value @] then [@ aspect.weight @]
else 1 end), as calculated_priority
FROM [@ source @] WHERE calculated_priority > 0 AND ( TRUE
AND ( [@ need.field @] [@ need.operator @] [@ need.value @] )
)
ORDER BY calculated_priority desc;
